input_text: What is the oil capacity for a 2015 Ford F-150 with the 5.0L V8?
output_text: The 2015 Ford F-150 with the 5.0L V8 engine has an oil capacity of 7.7 quarts (7.3 liters) with filter change. Use 5W-20 synthetic blend or full synthetic oil meeting Ford specification WSS-M2C945-B1. The oil filter part number is FL-500S (Motorcraft).
